title: Index Funds
text: We create cryptocurrency indexes and offer passive management funds that seek to replicate these indexes with the minimum possible tracking error.

title: Low Cost
text: We seek to optimize the investment costs in cryptocurrencies allowing our users to minimize management and avoid the transactional costs they incur when managing their portfolios.

title: Passive Management
text: We believe that investors benefit from low costs, and better returns in the long term, exposing themselves in a diversified way to the market through index funds.

title: Long Term View (HODL)
text: We offer products ideal for investors who follow a 'buy & hold' investment philosophy.

title: Diversification
text: Our index funds provides instant diversification, giving access to a portfolio with a 'bag' of assets in a single transaction.

title: Risk Minimization
text: By owning all the representative assets, you only run the risk of the market or sector, and not the risk of a single cryptocurrency.

title: Objectivity
text: Our indexes are built following a purely objective criterion for which there is no subjectivity or another type of personal assessment on the choice of assets.

title: Automatic rebalancing
text: Our index funds are rebalanced periodically to adjust the portfolio to the original criteria. This prevents any asset from taking a significant preponderance by misaligning the portfolio.
